00038 CPing::CPing(
00039                 const HWND hMessageWindow,
00040                 const char* c_pszHost,
00041                 const bool c_bResolveAddress,
00042                 const unsigned int c_uTimeout,
00043                 const unsigned int c_uSleep,
00044                 const unsigned int c_uUnreachableThreshold,
00045                 const unsigned int c_lBufferSize, 
00046                 const unsigned int c_uTtl) throw(CPingException):
00047 m_ulInetAddr(0L),
00048 m_pszHost(NULL),
00049 m_uBufferSize(c_lBufferSize),
00050 m_uTtl(c_uTtl),
00051 m_uUnreachableThreshold(c_uUnreachableThreshold),
00052 m_uTimeout(c_uTimeout),
00053 m_hMessageWindow(hMessageWindow),
00054 m_bDownSignalled(false),
00055 m_uFailedPings(0),
00056 m_uSleep(c_uSleep),
00057 m_uSequenceNumber(0),
00058 m_sd(INVALID_SOCKET)
00059 {
00060         struct hostent* pHostInfo = NULL;
00061 
00062         // try to convert the host address into a inet address
00063         m_ulInetAddr = inet_addr(c_pszHost);
00064         if (INADDR_NONE == m_ulInetAddr)
00065         {
00066                 // we assume this is a hostname, not an ip
00067                 pHostInfo = gethostbyname(c_pszHost);
00068                 if (NULL == pHostInfo)
00069                 {
00070                         throw CPingException("Could not resolve hostname");
00071                 }
00072                 else
00073                 {
00074                         m_pszHost = new char[strlen(c_pszHost) + 1];
00075                         memset(m_pszHost, 0, strlen(c_pszHost) + 1);
00076                         memcpy(m_pszHost, c_pszHost, strlen(c_pszHost)); 
00077 
00078                         memcpy(&(m_saDest.sin_addr), pHostInfo->h_addr, pHostInfo->h_length);
00079                         m_saDest.sin_family = pHostInfo->h_addrtype;
00080                 }       
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084                 // fill inet address for destination
00085                 m_saDest.sin_addr.s_addr = m_ulInetAddr;
00086                 m_saDest.sin_family = AF_INET;
00087                 if (c_bResolveAddress)
00088                 {
00089                         pHostInfo = gethostbyaddr((char *)&m_ulInetAddr, 4, AF_INET);
00090                         if (NULL != pHostInfo)
00091                         {
00092                                 m_pszHost = new char[strlen(pHostInfo->h_name) + 1];
00093                                 memset(m_pszHost, 0, strlen(pHostInfo->h_name) + 1);
00094                                 memcpy(m_pszHost, pHostInfo->h_name, strlen(pHostInfo->h_name));
00095                         }
00096                         else
00097                         {
00098                                 m_pszHost = new char[strlen(c_pszHost) + 1];
00099                                 memset(m_pszHost, 0, strlen(c_pszHost) + 1);
00100                                 memcpy(m_pszHost, c_pszHost, strlen(c_pszHost)); 
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103                 else
00104                 {
00105                         m_pszHost = new char[strlen(c_pszHost) + 1];
00106                         memset(m_pszHost, 0, strlen(c_pszHost) + 1);
00107                         memcpy(m_pszHost, c_pszHost, strlen(c_pszHost)); 
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         createSocket();
00112 
00113         m_hEvent = CreateEvent(NULL, TRUE, FALSE, "PingCancel event");
00114 
00115         m_pReplyBuffer = new char[IpPacket::MAX_PACKET_SIZE];
00116         memset(m_pReplyBuffer, 0, IpPacket::MAX_PACKET_SIZE);
00117 }

00119 void CPing::start()
00120 {
00121         // todo: check for successful thread creation
00122         m_hThread = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex(NULL, 0, CPing::threadFunc, this, 0, &m_uThreadId);
00123         if (0 == m_hThread)
00124         {
00125                 // failed to create thread
00126                 // check what exactly failed
00127                 switch (errno)
00128                 {
00129                 case EAGAIN:
00130                         // too many threads
00131                         OutputDebugString("Could not spawn ping thread. To many open threads");
00132                         // throw exception
00133                         break;
00134                 case EINVAL:
00135                         OutputDebugString("Could not spawn ping thread. Invalid argument or stack size");
00136                         break;
00137                 default:
00138                         break;
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 }
00142 
00143 void CPing::stop()
00144 {
00145         // todo: mutex for m_hEvent
00146         SetEvent(m_hEvent);
00147 }
00148 
00149 unsigned int __stdcall CPing::threadFunc(void *pParam)
00150 {
00151         CPing *pInstance = reinterpret_cast<CPing *>(pParam);
00152 
00153         if (isValidInstance(pInstance))
00154         {
00155                 pInstance->pingThread();
00156         }
00157 
00158         return 0;
00159 }
00160 
00161 bool CPing::isValidInstance(const CPing* pInstance)
00162 {
00163         return true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 CPing::~CPing()
00167 {
00168         if (m_sd != INVALID_SOCKET)
00169         {
00170                 closesocket(m_sd);
00171                 m_sd = INVALID_SOCKET;
00172         }
00173 
00174         long lResult;
00175 
00176         // wait for ping thread to end
00177         lResult = WaitForSingleObject(m_hThread, INFINITE);
00178         switch (lResult)
00179         {
00180         case WAIT_OBJECT_0:
00181                 // all fine
00182                 break;
00183         case WAIT_FAILED:
00184                 OutputDebugString("Waiting for ping thread to finish failed.");
00185                 break;
00186         }
00187 
00188 
00189         CloseHandle(m_hEvent);
00190 
00191         delete [] m_pReplyBuffer;
00192 
00193         // free host name
00194         if (m_pszHost != NULL)
00195         {
00196                 delete [] m_pszHost;
00197                 m_pszHost = NULL;
00198         }
00199 }
00200 
00201 void CPing::createSocket() throw(CPingException)
00202 {
00203         int nResult = 0;
00204 
00205         // create raw socket 
00206         m_sd = WSASocket(AF_INET, SOCK_RAW, IPPROTO_ICMP, 0,0,0);
00207         if (INVALID_SOCKET == m_sd)
00208         {
00209                 char buf[255] = {0};
00210                 sprintf(buf, "%ld", GetLastError());
00211                 OutputDebugString(buf);
00212                 throw CPingException("Could not create raw socket. Are you Administrator?");
00213         }
00214 
00215         // set TTL of socket
00216         nResult = setsockopt(m_sd, IPPROTO_IP, IP_TTL, (const char *)&m_uTtl, sizeof(m_uTtl));
00217         if (SOCKET_ERROR == nResult)
00218         {
00219                 throw CPingException(std::string("Could not set TTL of socket."));
00220         }
00221 }
00222 
00223 void CPing::pingThread()
00224 {
00225         long lResult;
00226         bool bLeave = false;
00227 
00228         // have a first checkup of the host
00229         if (!ping())
00230         {
00231                 fireDown();
00232                 m_bDownSignalled = true;
00233         }
00234 
00235         while (!bLeave)
00236         {
00237                 lResult = WaitForSingleObject(m_hEvent, m_uSleep);
00238                 switch (lResult)
00239                 {
00240                 case WAIT_TIMEOUT:
00241                         // Check if host is reachable
00242                         if (ping())
00243                         {
00244                                 OutputDebugString("Up\r\n");
00245                                 if (m_bDownSignalled)
00246                                 {
00247                                         fireUp();
00248                                         m_bDownSignalled = false;
00249                                 }
00250                                 m_uFailedPings = 0;
00251                         }
00252                         else
00253                         {
00254                                 OutputDebugString("Down\r\n");
00255                                 m_uFailedPings++;
00256                                 if (m_uFailedPings > m_uUnreachableThreshold && !m_bDownSignalled)
00257                                 {
00258                                         fireDown();
00259                                         m_bDownSignalled = true;
00260                                 }
00261                         }
00262                         break;
00263                 default:
00264                         bLeave = true;
00265                 }
00266         }
00267         ResetEvent(m_hEvent);
00268         m_uSequenceNumber = 0;
00269 }
00270 
00271 bool CPing::ping()
00272 {
00273         int nResult = SOCKET_ERROR;
00274         TIMEVAL tvTimeout = {0};
00275         fd_set fds = {0};
00276 
00277         tvTimeout.tv_usec = m_uTimeout * 1000;
00278         FD_ZERO(&fds);
00279         FD_SET(m_sd, &fds);
00280         sockaddr_in sa;
00281         //ip_header* pIpHeader;
00282         IcmpPacket* response = NULL;
00283         IpPacket* responsePacket = NULL;
00284 
00285         // copy dest address, routers overwrite it on DEST_UNREACHABLE
00286         memcpy(&sa, &m_saDest, sizeof(m_saDest));
00287 
00288         IcmpPacket packet(GetCurrentProcessId(), ++m_uSequenceNumber, m_uBufferSize);
00289 
00290         nResult = sendto(m_sd, 
00291                 packet.rawData(), packet.getSize(), 0, 
00292                 (const sockaddr *)&m_saDest, sizeof(m_saDest));
00293 
00294         if (SOCKET_ERROR == nResult)
00295         {
00296                 nResult = WSAGetLastError();
00297                 return false;
00298         }
00299 
00300 
00301         do 
00302         {
00303                 nResult = select(1, &fds, NULL, NULL, &tvTimeout);
00304                 OutputDebugString("After select\r\n");
00305 
00306                 if (nResult != 1)
00307                 {
00308                         return false;
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 int size = sizeof(m_saDest);
00312                 nResult = recvfrom(m_sd, 
00313                         (char *)m_pReplyBuffer, IpPacket::MAX_PACKET_SIZE, 0,
00314                         (sockaddr *)&sa, &size);
00315 
00316                 OutputDebugString("After recvfrom\r\n");
00317                 if (SOCKET_ERROR == nResult)
00318                 {
00319                         nResult = WSAGetLastError();
00320                         return false;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 if (responsePacket != NULL)
00324                 {
00325                         delete responsePacket;
00326                 }
00327 
00328                 responsePacket = new IpPacket(m_pReplyBuffer, nResult);
00329 
00330                 //pIpHeader = (ip_header *) m_pReplyBuffer;
00331                 if (response != NULL)
00332                 {
00333                         delete response;
00334                 }
00335                 //response = new IcmpPacket((m_pReplyBuffer + pIpHeader->h_len * 4), pIpHeader->total_length - (pIpHeader->h_len * 4));
00336                 response = new IcmpPacket(responsePacket->getPayload(), responsePacket->getPayloadSize());
00337 
00338                 // check sequence number
00339         }
00340         while (response->getSequenceNumber() != m_uSequenceNumber);
00341 
00342         // check length
00343         if (response->getType() != IcmpPacket::ICMP_TYPE_ECHO_REPLY)
00344         {
00345                 delete response;
00346                 OutputDebugString("Answer is not ECHO_REPLY");
00347                 return false;
00348         }
00349 
00350         if (response->getId() != GetCurrentProcessId())
00351         {
00352                 delete response;
00353                 OutputDebugString("Answer is not for us");
00354                 return false;
00355         }
00356 
00357         delete response;
00358         return true;
00359 }
00360 
00361 void CPing::fireUp()
00362 {
00363         ::PostMessage(m_hMessageWindow, CPing::PING_HOST_UP, (LPARAM)this, 0);
00364 }
00365 
00366 void CPing::fireDown()
00367 {
00368         ::PostMessage(m_hMessageWindow, CPing::PING_HOST_DOWN, (LPARAM)this, 0);
00369 }
